lines.name: Metro SubwayLink
lines.description: The Metro SubwayLink runs 15.4 miles from Owings Mills in western Baltimore County through downtown Baltimore to Johns Hopkins Hospital in East Baltimore. The line includes 6.2 miles of underground tunnel, 2.2 miles of elevated track, and 6.8 miles at grade. Trains operate every 8 minutes during rush hours and every 15 minutes during off-peak hours.
